entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
